website_summaries.verdict: This is an unbeatable value for your money if you want an impressive number and variety of seeds with access to information to help you develop your green thumb.
pros: Gardeners are impressed with these bulk, non-GMO seeds, including more than 100,000 seeds in a wide variety known to attract pollinators
Kit includes seven ebooks loaded with growing tips
cons: Germination may take a while in some regions, especially those with limited sun
A few growers gripe of green foliage with few blooms or limited germination, but many more experience excellent results

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Offer
customer_reviews.text: Look no further for wildflower seeds...professionally packaged with complete information about seed content, big packages with lots of seeds, and perfect, fresh mixture. Bonus information on gardening with wildflower seeds is more like a complete book than an add on item. Information is presented with meaningful ideas and colorful presentation. Honestly, this purchase is worth triple the price it is selling for, but don't tell the seller.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I planted and watered meticulously... almost zero germination.. but wait.. I was wrong... my watering system was off for a week and when I restarted the irrigation the seeds germinated big time... Thank you BBB
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Salsich

customer_reviews.title: Great packages
customer_reviews.text: Using these for our wedding favors! Ran out so we had to order a second package... now we get to use them ourselves!!! I love trying to help save the bees 🐝 so this package is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These seeds sprouted so quickly and with minimal work! My kind of gardening. :)
customer_reviews.author: Monica L.

customer_reviews.title: Came with more weeds than flowers, messed up my lawn :(
customer_reviews.text: After having planted these seeds I did get some beautiful flowers! But I also got a crap ton of weeds and crab grass. My whole beautiful healthy lawn was negatively effected by these weeds that came with these flowers. My grass will never be the same unless I pay mega bucks to have it fixed. Really sucks. Did not foresee this being an issue. Unfortunate surprise.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sprouted quickly already started blooming !
customer_reviews.text: I planted these seeds about a month ago (before last frost in April). They quickly sprouted and are already blooming (it's May 31). And this despite the fact that they are in a relatively shady spot (under a tree). Wonderful ! First photo is from May 31 Second photo June 17
customer_reviews.author: user.777777

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Good, Well Sealed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't ordered seeds online much before, but this was effectively the perfect experience. I got exactly what I asked for, each packet was twice sealed, they ended up sitting in the pouring rain for two days on accident, but the seeds were perfectly dry when I opened them. The shipping was prompt and accurate. As far as the efficacy of the seeds, they're already in the ground so fingers crossed that I know how to read directions and grow them correctly. All told, can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These have been beautiful since they first started blooming. I planted them in May, and they have been gorgeous the entire summer, changing day to day with new flowers popping up throughout the season. It's October and they are still going strong. Butterflies, bees, and hummingbirds have visited. They have been a joy for months. Today there were four butterflies all day. Such a pleasure to watch. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: suby0402

customer_reviews.title: 2018 great, 2019 not so much
customer_reviews.text: I loved this seed mix when I sowed them in 2018, so I ordered several packs for 2019. I am not sure what they added to the 2019 mix but one plant is nothing short of an invasive weed. I sowed these along two sections of my fence and now this "flower" has spread to every corner of my half acre. They put off these very tiny pink specks of a flower and just are taking over everything. I will not purchase this mix again. If I wanted an invasive ground cover, that is what I would have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - Doubtful content, more hype than substance
customer_reviews.text: I received as much marketing material as seed in my package. Not sure it was needed. Planted seeds per the instructions. Some flowers came up. With 87,000 seeds, I would have expected much more. I sowed the three packs in different adjacent patches. 1 did OK, the other two were really thin and one of them came up mostly basil. When was basil a wild flower? Since then I have found and used a few different seed vendors and got much better results. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Robin Charbit

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are separated in three different packages for ...
customer_reviews.text: No filler in these seeds!! Shoots are coming fast. Can't wait to see the lovely flowers. I love that they are separated in three different packages for birds, butterflies, and bees. The bonus gardening ebooks are very helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Meclbk

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sprouts in 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. I raked a patch of bare earth on the edge of our property, and let the kids sprinkle the seeds around the fresh dirt. Within a week we had 100's of sprouting seeds. They have not yet flowered, its much too early for that, but lots of growth so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Properties

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out in custom seed packets as a wedding favor and my guests loved them. We got two orders and had plenty of extras so we planted them in our garden. A lot of the flowers have come up and they're beautiful! We live in Colorado where there's a ton of sun and even a couple months later we're still getting new blooms. And the flowers seem to stay for a while. I have no idea which ones are annuals vs perennials but I look forward to seeing what pics up next year.
customer_reviews.author: Ay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used these to draw in bees and butterflies in our squash garden. They grow amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ander

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Absolutely spectacular wild flowers! I’m beyond amazed at how great they grew. Every day I get so much joy seeing what is blooming. I planted in early May. The flowers appear to be at their peak now, late July. The Cosmos and zinnias are my favorite 💕 I weeded first, then spread my seeds in the awkward dirt space in between the public sidewalk and my rock garden beds. So thankful to have such a beautiful flower display where normally there are weeds... the in between zone! Just make sure to water every day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to some bare spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. If your a first time user you need to know that these do not come up like weeds. They take a couple of months. They say that you can plant them late in the season but no. Plant them in early April and you should have flowers from June until the first frost. The seeds go a long way so don't be disappointed with the size of the packages. They need to be well spread out. The results are lovely if you do it right.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Has done well in Tampa FL, garden zone 9b (SANDY soil and SUN)
customer_reviews.text: Has done well in Sandy soil (Zone 9b Tampa, FL) Hard to grow anything with sandy soil and no shade. I decided on wildflowers and Native plants. I did water them a bit, daily, for the 1st 5 weeks just because it was SO hot (90 degrees +) and not raining at all. I do less now that they’ve taken root though, and these wildflowers have done great. The tall ones are AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: KB83

customer_reviews.title: Great Color & Variety!
customer_reviews.text: Usually we grow tomatoes in our GrowBoxes on our deck, this year we decided to sow some of these wildflower seeds instead. Wow, great variety and color! Very pleased and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C. Brantly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wildflowers!
customer_reviews.text: I took a shot in the dark throwing down these wildflower seeds on a bare slope in front of my house along the road, and could not be more in love with the outcome! By no means do I have a green thumb, all I did was scatter these seeds on the slope (that I previously cleared), walked all over them (literally) then watered and that was it! Took about a month to see any blooms but it was well worth the wait, now I have my very own wild flower meadow! I can not wait to buy more to extend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle simms

customer_reviews.title: They grew well for me in Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: These grew really well for me in Minnesota. They were very colorful. I planted them in early June, and it's late September and some of them are wilting now because it's been particularly cold recently. The bumble bees really got into them in August, and I saw a few monarchs coming and going every day. I was happy with them! I had a lot of weeds in my garden too, so they would probably look even better if I got rid of those!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Solution Ever
customer_reviews.text: This mix is great! Upon receiving the seeds, I combined all packets with some planting soil, mixed it all together, hand-spread between my fence and sidewalk. Prep work on the soil? Rip up grass, thrown down seed. The seeds germinated quickly. We had a very harsh summer, little to no rain, so I watered every couple of days at first. These flowers baked in the sun all summer long and grew enormous. Photo taken in September and doesn't do justice to the colors on display! So many people commented on how beautiful they looked. Super easy and yields amazing results.
customer_reviews.author: Mattosaurus

customer_reviews.title: It’s only been 3 weeks since I’ve planted them...
customer_reviews.text: I bought and planted these in my flower beds next to my pool thinking they’d be sturdy enough to get “watered” with chlorine water when my kids played, and to withstand some neglect when I have to rely on someone else to take care of them. It’s been 3 weeks and I honestly had no idea they would be so huge. Now, the flower bed with the “butterfly and bees” packet is doing the best. The other packet (don’t remember exactly which one I used) is doing well, but not growing nearly as fast. I can’t wait for them to start blooming. I’m just hoping they don’t get too much bigger lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, beautiful and attracts birds, bees and butterflies
customer_reviews.text: These seeds did what what they said and attracted beautiful butterflies and cute baby bees! My soil is VERY bad and infested with ants on the hill, I have a hard time keeping potted plants alive on it, but the seeds were hearty and grew well, I feel like I see a new flower every day! For the top of my hill I simply threw some seeds up hoping they would stick and now I have bursts of poppies and purple flowers sporadically coming up in new places each week! I water maybe 3 or 4 times a month in the California heat and they are doing well. Love these seeds, just purchased again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCAM SCAM SCAM
customer_reviews.text: I bought $75 worth of seeds and got ZERO. NADA. NONE. Not a SINGLE flower came up, and it's been 3 months, with lots of rain and sunshine. I bought seeds for this area. I spread them out as instructed. Nothing. total ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mix
customer_reviews.text: Love this mix! Some of the flowers - daisies, cone fowers, purple ones I forget the name of - were there already. The rest are from these seeds! I also have a huge garden in the back for cutting flowers also from this one $15 purchase! Also some weeds probably but some weeds are pretty anyway for a little while. I'ma very laid back - meaning I would rather lay back down after sprinkling some seeds instead of digging and spending $$$ on plants and I only weed twice an it's only to control ivy. Stupid ivy. So - if you like flowers, and are lazy - buy these seeds
customer_reviews.author: txm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing seeds Basic gardening required for success (planting soil and proper watering as well as plenty of sun)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing seeds sprout quickly and produce lots of flowers if you take the time to do a few basic steps to insure they grow. Get a large bag of potting soil something organic with Bat guano and worm casings wet the dirt, sprinkle the seeds, cover the seeds in 3-4 inches of dirt and water, Keep in full sun and water as needed, don't over or under water. I assume the negative reviews are from people who do not understand how to plant successfully
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No filler and super fresh seeds
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the amount of seed in the packs!! I have bought wildflower seed at the the big box garden outlets and have always been disappointed at the amount of filler in the bags. With these bags, all you get is seed and no fillers making it much easier to spread it exactly where you want it. Will buy again, thanks 😃
customer_reviews.author: Dad 'O' Three

customer_reviews.title: Wildflower seeds in bulk
customer_reviews.text: The seeds arrived on time and well packed. We are delighted with the mix of wild flowers and anxious to see the come up. We are now prepareing the places we will plant them and very excited about this planting. The ebook we have access to through this purchase is very helpful for a number of things not the least of which are the great recipes! The recpes were a definite bonus! We will purchase again from this seller and recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: jacquej

customer_reviews.title: Fullully Blooms in Florida!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that for sure it would be to hot to grow these bad boys outside here in central Florida but man...was I wrong. The seeds germinated within the first three days and now (about 8 weeks later) I have two beautiful cosmos blooms with plenty more on their way. I love the variety and germination rate of these seed. I will DEFINITELY buy more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love these seeds!
customer_reviews.text: Just scratch a bit of dirt off the surface of where you want to plant these, cover them lightly, add water and you'll have sprouts in a day or two. Great seeds, surprising mix. You'll never know what is going to come up where, but they are just gorgeous and the birds and bees and butterflies LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: LMRND

customer_reviews.title: Sad nothing sprouted
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had some awesome wildflower pictures to attach, but NONE sprouted. I don’t know if I received a bad batch, but it never worked despite following all the recommended steps. C’est la vie!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: The bees love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago and planted them right away. They are very colorful and tall. I planted them in front of my porch, and they go well above it by quite a bit, but they are still beautiful nonetheless. We're getting our first bit of cold weather here in MI, and I can definitely say that these do NOT enjoy it at all. They died really fast, but that's understandable because I don't like the cold either lol. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Planted in Arizona!!!! Amazing blooms!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put these in 3 large pots that have watering systems, we live in Arizona. My goodness, do these produce!!!! My gardener had never seen such amazing blooms, so I gave him my LAST packet. Flowers galore!!! Just ordered some more. Great gifts for anyone, just throw the seeds anywhere there is soil and water. Just had to order more, can't keep the seeds myself, everyone wants them. BEAUTIFUL for Arizona!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Ragdoll Cats

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color and Texture...
customer_reviews.text: Howdi garden peeps! I bought these seed packs in Spring for an update of color and texture in my 25 year old perennial garden. I am so excited with the outcome. WOW!!! Amazing! I just bought a second set of seeds and have updated another garden. Can't wait to see this one bloom later this Summer & Fall... and will be anxious to see both bloom in glory come Spring next year. Have any times more butterflies and bees enjoying the garden, YAHOO!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Great Flower Choices, Fast Growing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best seed choice ever. They attract all of the birds and insects that I want in my yard. Some are perennial (return every year) and some are annual (bloom all summer) so the area chosen for planting will never be bare and new seeds can easily be added each year. Within 3 days, I had an overall green look and even some white flowers. I've never seen this happen before. I will be buying more seeds from BBB Seed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: These seeds were amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I sewed these seeds along the narrow strip with poor soil between my sidewalk and curb, and the blooms were amazing. The sunflowers grew seven feet tall, and the little patch began to attract goldfinches and pollinators of many types. I'm going to expand this patch to other parts of my yard, asap.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Rondack

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Planted in SC in mild mid March. Will update in June once they grow and bloom, but for now...arrived fast...tossed the seeds...they are sprouting everywhere after a week of temps in 70's and low 80's and light watering. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: There are so many seeds! I am looking forward to seeing them come up. In my search for seeds I found this deal to be a great value for the amount of seeds you get. They came quickly and are packaged nicely. They come with online gardening tips and resources.
customer_reviews.author: Skilitchi

customer_reviews.title: More than just seeds, information for a successful harvest.
customer_reviews.text: The seeds shipped and arrived as they stated. The ebooks are a good source of information including how to collect your own seeds. BBBseed sent me an email immediately after receiving my order and offered to answer any question I may have. I am impressed with their concerns that I have all the information I need for success with their seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: I live in Minnesota and planted these in early spring ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota and planted these in early spring. I basically just spread them around and then lightly raked all of the soil that the seeds were in. I figured the strongest would survive and that's exactly what happened. It's the end of September and I have had flowers blooming since late July or early August. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kalien

customer_reviews.title: Lots of color.
customer_reviews.text: I planted these in the middle of March, and kept the dirt moist until they germinated. I water every three days, and the 100 degree heat wave didn't kill them off. It is now early June and I have several beautiful wildflower patches. More flowers are reaching for the sky. I can't wait to see what they are when they open.
customer_reviews.author: kristy frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great filler!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought these for wedding favors, then used the extra at our house. Didn't take much seed to fill our front flower bed, nice addition to the front of the house! I lightly raked the area briefly, tossed the seeds and the flowers are continually blooming, it's nice to see what flowers pop up! I've seen more bees and butterflies as well! Second time purchaser with the company, great customer service. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: KerriTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Finally, My Wild Flower Garden!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, received with in 2 days of order. Can't wait to see how these seeds grow! Great customer service and excellent turn around on order. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen A

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Gardening Information
customer_reviews.text: My order of wildflower seeds arrived quickly and packaged well. The instructions are clear and reference other sites for more information. The gardening books were easy to access and contained helpful tips and information, especially for the new gardener. I haven’t yet planted them but am really looking forward to seeing these beautiful flowers. I raise Monarch butterflies so I want as many flowers for the pollinators as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly just weeds -UPDATE to 5
customer_reviews.text: Two very pretty flowers grew. Unfortunately that was it and now I have an island full of weeds. Really bummed because of all great reviews! UPDATE: They took a long time....til mid summer but then there they were!! I think I overplanted actually....so many flowers/blooms!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Seeds with no filler!
customer_reviews.text: Got the seeds last week and they are in and on the ground. They seem high-quality and am looking forward to them growing over the next few months and laying down more seeds from the flowers. I'll post an update in a few months with before and after pics!
customer_reviews.author: ShowMeTheMoney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on Time Sure Hope They Grow
customer_reviews.text: The seeds arrived as scheduled and are packed for 2018. As it is winter here and the ground is solidly frozen I will not be planting them for a while so cannot testify to the germination rates, etc. There appear to be hundreds and hundreds of seeds and hopefully they will be much improved over past purchases from other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: hoons

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these seeds for three years in a row and had beautiful flowers. This year all I had was a garden of weeds. When I contacted the seller he said I must not have ‘tilled the soil’. Not only did I till the soil, I added fertilizer and mulch. Will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Glass Girl

customer_reviews.title: our gardens are amazing! 3 packages of seeds
customer_reviews.text: Believe your eyes..........our gardens are amazing! 3 packages of seeds!
customer_reviews.author: conva

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I put these seeds down on nice topsoil and watered them a month ago. 0 flowers, sprouts, anything has come up! My hope for nice flowers to cover an area failed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Cute sprouts- too early to comment on flower quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and on time. I planted all three packages 3 week ago and they started to sprout this weekend. Too early to tell about how many grow to fruition, but they are plentiful and cute (sprouts) so far. Will edit in 2 months as to end process results.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful assortment of flowers.
customer_reviews.text: We sowed the seeds down fence lines and filler in flower beds. We planted them very late in the season and we're pleasently surprised at the flowers we got. We had tons of butterflies and a few humming birds enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: L Smith

customer_reviews.title: lots of flowers! and then some!
customer_reviews.text: lots of flowers from this collection!! Update: Hundreds of flowers! Dominated by Zinnas, Cosmos, tall marigolds, etc. Ground preparation with a thin layer of topsoil, and keep moist with watering every 4 hours using automatic timers for 3-5 minutes. (Florida heat even in May) The ground is COVERED with flowers. I will buy these seeds next year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don h

customer_reviews.title: None Grew
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one month ago. Followed directions, watched YouTube videos and tamped down with thin layer of soil, even made a barrier to keep animals and birds out and nothing sprouted. Planted some under a shady Willow tree and some under thin palm tree that gets full sun. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: AquaLady

customer_reviews.title: Terrific seeds - great germination - wonderful colors. Your bees, hummingbirds, butterflies will be very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I used this mix in my wildflower garden last year and all summer long it was alive with pollinators. I seeded again this year with this mix and the germination rate must be close to 100% as my garden is currently (June 13) knee deep and thick with plants. Am looking forward to another summer of color and happy pollinators. I recommend this mix highly.
customer_reviews.author: Carter S.

customer_reviews.title: The number of seeds per package is great compared to any thing Else that i found
customer_reviews.text: After looking for monarch butterfly food, I found this deal. The number of seeds per package is great compared to any thing Else that i found. also included is the gardening books with some how to. I can not wait to plant a flower garden to see what butterfly's and birds i can attract.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Seeds!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in beautiful shape. There are A LOT of seeds in these packets! Can't wait to get out into the garden!
customer_reviews.author: klong

customer_reviews.title: Not a gardener, but they’re growing!
customer_reviews.text: All the seeds I planted are coming up, despite the fact that I’m no gardener! Can’t wait to see all the flowers, we are going to have a ton! And the bees will be happy too! I couldn’t figure out how to download the books so I just scattered the seeds!
customer_reviews.author: Alice G

customer_reviews.title: Good Company but Must Wait to See if the seeds Grow.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good supply of seeds for the money but I will not know if it is worth it until/if the seeds grow and flower. I will post again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: llacosse

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not a very good deal. Go buy seeds at the store in your town, much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: wood

customer_reviews.title: Growing wild flowers in the back yard NY.
customer_reviews.text: My order was delivered fast. Seeds look very nice, instruction how to plant is handy too. I followed what it suggested and now I have to wait until those flowers germinate and start to grow. My hope is for the best. Will let you know. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia D.

customer_reviews.title: Produced one single bloom :(
customer_reviews.text: Man, I’m super disappointed. The kids and I prepped the flower bed and laid seed as instructed and we have had one, yes just one, flower bloom. I planted some seeds from a local hardware store the same day and that small garden is blooming like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: David Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Looking Forward To Great Flowers
customer_reviews.text: Loved how the packets of seeds arrived and the detailed instructions couldn’t not have been better! Looking forward to my next review when the flowers bloom
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Easy. Rake, sprinkle seeds, rake again, water.
customer_reviews.text: At first, some green stuff grows, but no flowers. Then they all flower like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was just the incentive to plant a garden for bees. Easy to do and waiting for the seeds to come up now.
customer_reviews.author: PKM

customer_reviews.title: Cannot wait!
customer_reviews.text: I have not planted these yet but I am super excited to get them going when the time is right. I love the mixtures of seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph T

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful instructions included
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way the seeds were packed into three different categories. And the pdf sent to me to aid with planting was really appreciated. I have not used the seeds yet, I'm waiting until the best time to plant them. But I really appreciate the information given to me for when the time is right.
customer_reviews.author: c-go

customer_reviews.title: ... seeds for an afterschool science class and they were awesome! Each package contained beautiful healthy and clean seeds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of seeds for an afterschool science class and they were awesome! Each package contained beautiful healthy and clean seeds, no fillers. The packages were bright and appealing and contained a full list of all of the species of flower contained as well as planting directions. I love the idea of the Pollinator Project, and there is a lot of great information on the BBB website. I had never heard of this company before, but would highly recommend them. It was a great bonus as an educator to be about to get the additional ebooks that came along with the order. Thank you for being such a great resource!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Deb's Science Class

customer_reviews.title: Private butterfly garden 🦋
customer_reviews.text: I have my own butterfly garden, right in front of my window! Beautiful mix - very colorful, tall, strong wild flowers that attract a plethora of butterflies, bumble bees and even hummingbirds 💜 The photos attached were taken in September, I live in the Midwest. They started blooming around early July.
customer_reviews.author: J R Vang

customer_reviews.title: WHERE ARE THE '' E BOOKS'' ?
customer_reviews.text: JUST PLANTED SEEDS -WE'LL SEE HOW THEY DO WOULD BE NICE TO KNOW IF I DID IT RIGHT --BUT--- NO 'EXPERT GUIDENCE''
customer_reviews.author: dr. george arnett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today. I haven't had time to do anything yet. I don't see how to access the eBooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of seeds!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the most product for your money! I am using these seeds as a wedding favor. I hope the product has great quality for my guests as it had quanity for me!
customer_reviews.author: #twinning2017

customer_reviews.title: Good seeds, but no books
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome I can't wait for spring! I don't think I got the information for the e-books though. I love to read and was looking forward to that, but ultimately, these select species was what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Austin K Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: i do not know if they will grow or what they will look like, it will take months to grow them
customer_reviews.text: i just got the seeds , i do not know if they will grow or what they will look like , it will take months to grow them , so i can not give feedback yet, but there is no note or letter to explain how or where to get the E books .
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kelderman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant germination rate
customer_reviews.text: These seeds are absolutely wonderful. In spite of very late frosts and terrible soil, the germination rate far exceeded my expectations. The pollinators swarmed through and the flower garden was a delight to us (and especially my mother-in-law, for whom it was planted) I am excited to see how many self seed next year. I also plan to significantly increase the size and quantity of the flower beds. Thank you for providing such wonderful non-GMO, neo-free seeds.

product_meta.title: Wildflower Seeds - 8 Bonus Gardening eBooks - Bulk Annual/Perennial Seed - Open-Pollinated, Non-GMO, No Fillers, Wild Flower Seeds for Fall Planting, Bees, Humming Birds, Butterflies, Pollinators
product_meta.description:
THE QUALITY DIFFERENCE: Beauty Beyond Belief is a small, family-owned company helping you.

8 eBOOK EDUCATION SERIES: A Gardener’s Guide to Pollinators, Organic Pest Control, A Beginners Guide to Gardening, Getting Started with Seed Saving, Succession Planting, Fall Wildflower Seed Planting and Our Favorite Recipes!

BEE RESCUE MIX: 27,000 seeds (1 oz) for lush coverage of over 100 square feet. Nemophila menziesii, Monarda fistulosa, Linum perenne, Eschescholzia californica, Callistephus chinensis, Cynoglossum amabile, Papaver rhoeas, Erigeron speciosus, Gilia capitata, Coreopsis lanceolata, Layia platyglossa, Gaillardia pulchella, Coreopsis tinctoria, Echinacea purpurea, Cheirantus allionii, Lobularia maritima, Agastache foeniculum, Aster novae-angliae.

HONEY SOURCE MIX: 27,000 seeds (1 oz) for lush coverage of over 100 square feet. Mix includes: Gaillardia aristata, Eschscholzia californica, Callistephhus chinensis, Cynoglossum amabile, Phacelia tanacetifolia, Coreopsis lanceolata, Aster novae-angliac, Ratibida columnifera, Echinacea purpurea, Dalea purpureum, Potentilla thurberi, Cheiranthus allionii, Cosmos sulphureus, Reseda odorata, Papaver rhoeas, Pycranthemum tranifolium, Agastache foeniculum, Ocimum basilicum and Anchusa capensis 

BUTTERFLIES AND BIRDS MIX: 33,000 seeds (1 oz) for lush coverage of over 100 square feet. Mix includes: Lobularia maritima, Echinacea purpurea, Rudbeckia hirta, Centaurea cyanus, Coreopsis lanceolata, Coreopsis tinctoria, Callisterphus chinenis, Linum perenne, Iberis umbellata, , Cleome serrulata, Ratibida columnifera, Rudeckia gloriosa, Delphinium ajacis, Asclepias tuberosa, Gaillardia aristata, Gaillardia pulchella, Cosmos bipinnatus, Cosmos sulphureus, Lupinus perennis, Helianthus annuus, Monarda citriodora, Clarkia amoena and Zinnia elegans .
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY SEEDS and EXPERT GUIDANCE: Experience the Beauty Beyond Belief Seed difference. We are committed to providing the highest quality, open-pollinated, non-GMO/non-GE seeds to our customers, guaranteed. A trusted source of high quality seeds since 1985. 8 BONUS eBooks including gardening education series provides expert guidance for success! TO RECEIVE YOUR E-BOOKS, Please Check Your Amazon Email Preferences Settings and Make Sure "Do not send me marketing e-mail" is Deselected."

ATTRACT MORE POLLINATORS: We know seeds and we know pollinators! Our expertly crafted botanical garden seed mixes contain a wide variety of both perennials and annuals that are specifically designed to attract pollinators. Attract more pollinator friendly honey bees, native bees, butterflies, birds and humming birds. Gardener tested, pollinator approved!

FULL LUSH COVERAGE: Wildflower seeds bulk 87,000 seed quantity to give you the coverage you desire. Each pollinator friendly wildflower seed packet gives you over 100 sq. ft. of lush wildflower coverage. 3 packets collectively give you over 300 sq. ft. of beautiful wildflowers. That’s over 3 oz. or 85 grams of pure seeds with no fillers. Compare and see the quality value.

SAVE THE BEES: Bee Rescue Mix: 27,000 seeds (1 oz.) 100 sq. ft. lush coverage of wildflowers expertly designed to provide nectar and pollen for full season support of native and introduced bee species, hardy over the most growing zones. Honey Source Mix: 27,000 seeds (1 oz.) lush coverage of bee blooming annual and perennial mix providing nectar and pollen for vital nutrition for the European Honey Bees helping to reduce stress and starvation that contributes to colony collapse.
This Wildflower Mixes will make the perfect Christmas gifts for those gardeners in your life.
